Detailed Description

Definition at line 1740 of file bp_interconnect.h.

Member Function Documentation

BpInterconnect::exec_status Bp::BpInterconnect::BpCommandTraceRegister::Execute ( bp_output_cb_t *  outputCb,
uvm_ml_time_unit  timeUnit,
double  timeValue 
) [virtual]

interface of the method to either broadcast the command to all the frameworks (for internal commands) or to execute it directly (for internal commands)

Parameters:
frameworkId - the framework the command was originated from (-1 - interactively)
command_with_arguments - full command-line (without uvm_ml(_) prefix)
outputCb - additional stream to print output to
timeUnit - current simulation time units enum (TIME_UNIT_UNDEFINED if the framework does not have an ability to advance time)
timeValue - numeric value of current simulation time scaled according to timeUnit
Returns:
UVM_ML_COMMAND_SUCCESS - UVM_ML_COMMAND_FAILURE - UVM_ML_UNRECOGNIZED_COMMAND -
